Name: fromRoleNames
Description: Child Role list will be loaded based on this list. If empty, all roles will be loaded.

Name: componentId
Description: Id of role autocomplete.

Name: selectedRole
Description: Required input and output value for selected role.

Name: excludedRolenames
Description: Roles to be excluded from role selection. Applied if you use default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Message to be displayed when role autocomplete validation fails.

Name: forceSelection
Description: If true, only accept roles from the given list.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: Number of characters to be typed before starting to offer autocomplete.

Name: completeMethod
Description: Method for role autocomplete.

Name: isDisabled
Description: If true, Role Selection is disabled.

Name: isRequired
Description: If true, Marks Role Selection is required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: If true, user cannot change role.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: Specify the rendering of message for role field.

Name: hightlight
Description: Highlights the first suggested role automatically.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: If true, display label with floating style and labelPanelStyleClass can't be applied.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete input.

Name: labelPanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label panel.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label.

Name: label
Description: Text of label for role selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters. usesed to determine the width of the input element.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: Message style class.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Displayed text of selected role and roles in dropdown list.

Name: cache
Description: If true, autocomplete caches the search result list.

Name: moreText
Description: The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay in milliseconds before sending a query to the server.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results to be displayed.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: scrollHeight attribute of primefaces autocomplete.

Name: hasCustomizedSelectionList
Description: If true, the customized selection list is displayed.

Name: isShowAvatarInSelectionList
Description:
| Boolean value to specify avatar showing. Set to true to show avatar.
| The setting will detect Portal setting Portal.ShowAvatar as its default value, refer to HowTo: Update :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to true.

Name: displayNameRenderedInSelectionList
Description: If false, the name of security member in the selection list is hidden.

Name: displayNameInSelectionListStyleClass
Description: Style class of display name in the selection list

Name: selectionListContainerStyleClass
Description: Style class of item's container in the selection list

Name: emptyMessage
Description: Message to show when there's no option in selection list.
